data.name: City of God I:Prison Empire-Plague-瘟疫（资料片）
data.detailed_description:
In the second large DLC [plague], you have become the largest and only gang leader in Crist. But not everyone is willing to surrender to you, you will be here to meet new challenges.



More stories
·The story will happen after you unify Crist. (only in Empire Mode)
·A more than 2W word derivative story will reveal the story behind Natasha and the National Unity Party. Your choice will determine if you can understand the truth and don't miss every detail.
·The plague is coming, are you ready?



New look building
·Anubis City and Crist Building will no longer be what you know.
·A new kind of enemy, this is a special enemy that has never appeared before - the corpsemen.



Brand new prisoner
·After completing a specific mission, your prison will welcome the special Blue Star consultant professional prisoner.
·They have their own stories, and they have unique abilities that far exceed the average consultant prisoner.
·When you get them at the same time, you can get a strong fetter - power of the Faithful Panda.



Use special weapons to deal with the special enemies
Tramp and Dr.Reken's research will bring you brand new weapons or equipment, including
·Intensive weapons: The basic attributes are strengthened on the basis of the original weapons, which are more powerful but more difficult to obtain.
·AA-12 automatic shotgun: You can't imagine what kind of effect a shotgun has on the rifle's rate of fire. I suggest you can experience it yourself.
·11 type sniper grenade gun: High damage! High range! Range damage! Still need to say more?
·Chainsaw: For deal with the corpsemen, how can you not have the most classic chainsaw?





Top level
·At the end of the DLC, You will welcome the hardest level ever - the Crist Building.
·Challenge higher floors and get more rewards!
·You will be able to get more intensive drawings here, and even the drawings of Tramp gold coins!
·If you are lucky enough to pass the level, there may be an unexpected surprise waiting for you.

data.short_description: The Plague DLC is a derivative DLC designed specifically for the Empire model. It includes not only the follow-up story of the empire mode, but also be related to the story in the story mode, and it also includes a large number of new weapons, new drawings, new prisoners and new levels.

fullgame.name: 上帝之城 I：监狱帝国 [City of God I - Prison Empire]

data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 10 （Best for 64 Bit)| Can't run on XP
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB graphics memory, capable of Shader Model 1.1
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 10（Best for 64 Bit) | Can't run on XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy City of God I:Prison Empire-Plague-瘟疫（资料片）
